name: Trash BASH!
description:
This is a coopetition game where two neighbors have to get rid of their garbage as fast as possible. Tough luck that the garbage chutes are connected to each other, so disposed garbage always ends up in the other player's room! You can play in local coop using the keyboard and / or controllers.

Controls Player 1:
WASD / left analog - movement
E /  B-button - pickup / drop off

Controls Player 2:
arrow keys / left analog - movement
M /  B-button - pickup / drop off
